summary.description:
The Effect of Medication and Deep Brain Stimulation on Posture in Parkinson's Disease.

NeuroPostureApp©, Klinik f&uumlr Neurologie, UKSH Campus Kiel.

WebApp to measure bending angle in camptocormia patients. Based on the article **to be published** from Nils Margraf and Günther Deuschl et al.

||| CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'stooped posture postural'
summary.name: NeuroPostureApp
